DevResources.name: Can I Use
DevResources.description: Can I Use is a tool that provides up-to-date browser support tables for support of front-end web technologies on desktop and mobile web browsers.

DevResources.name: Codepen
DevResources.description: CodePen is a social development environment for front-end designers and developers. Build and deploy a website, show off your work, build test cases to learn and debug, and find inspiration.

DevResources.name: Coolors
DevResources.description: Coolors is a super fast colour scheme generator for designers and developers. Get your perfect palette at your fingertips.

DevResources.name: CSS Stats
DevResources.description: CSS Stats provides analytics and visualizations for your stylesheets. This information can be used to improve consistency in your design, track performance of your app, and diagnose complex areas before it snowballs out of control.

DevResources.name: CSS Tricks
DevResources.description: CSS-Tricks is a website about web design and development. It was created by Chris Coyier in 2007. It is a well-known site for web developers.

DevResources.name: Font Awesome
DevResources.description: Font Awesome is a font and icon toolkit based on CSS and LESS. It was made by Dave Gandy for use with Bootstrap, and later was incorporated into the BootstrapCDN.

DevResources.name: GitHub
DevResources.description: GitHub is a web-based platform for version control using git. It is also where users can collaborate on or adopt open-source code projects, fork code, share ideas and more.

DevResources.name: Google Analytics
DevResources.description: Google Analytics is a web analytics service offered by Google that tracks and reports website traffic, currently as a platform inside the Google Marketing Platform brand.

DevResources.name: Google Fonts
DevResources.description: Google Fonts is a library of free licensed font families, an interactive web directory for browsing the library, and APIs for conveniently using the fonts via CSS and Android.

DevResources.name: HTML5 Doctor
DevResources.description: HTML5 Doctor is helping you implement HTML5 today. This site is packed with articles, web development tips, and all the code you need to get started.

DevResources.name: Krystal UK
DevResources.description: Krystal is a UK-based hosting company that offers a range of hosting services, including shared hosting, VPS hosting, and dedicated servers.

DevResources.name: LinkedIn
DevResources.description: LinkedIn is a business and employment-oriented online service that operates via websites and mobile apps. It is mainly used for professional networking, including employers posting jobs and job seekers posting their CVs.

DevResources.name: MDN Web Docs
DevResources.description: MDN Web Docs is the ultimate resource for developers. It is a wiki that provides developers with information on how to use open web technologies including HTML, CSS, and JavaScript.

DevResources.name: Next.js
DevResources.description: Next.js is a React framework that enables functionality such as server-side rendering and generating static websites for React based web applications.

DevResources.name: PageSpeed Insights
DevResources.description: PageSpeed Insights is a tool that helps you identify ways to make your site faster and more mobile-friendly.

DevResources.name: Shopify Cheat Sheets
DevResources.description: Shopify Cheat Sheets is a collection of cheat sheets for Shopify developers. It includes a Liquid cheat sheet, a Shopify cheat sheet, and a Shopify theme cheat sheet.

DevResources.name: SVG Repo
DevResources.description: SVG Repo is a great resource for free SVG icons. It has a large collection of icons that you can use in your projects.

DevResources.name: Tailwind CSS
DevResources.description: Tailwind CSS is a utility-first CSS framework for rapidly building custom designs. It is a highly customizable, low-level CSS framework that gives you all of the building blocks you need to build bespoke designs without any annoying opinionated styles you have to fight to override.

DevResources.name: W3 Schools
DevResources.description: W3Schools is a web developer information website, with tutorials and references relating to web development topics such as HTML, CSS, JavaScript, PHP, SQL, and JQuery.

DevResources.name: WebAIM
DevResources.description: WebAIM is a non-profit organization that provides web accessibility solutions. It is a great resource for learning about web accessibility and how to make your websites more accessible.

DevResources.name: YouTube
DevResources.description: YouTube is a video-sharing platform that allows users to upload, view, rate, share, add to playlists, report, comment on videos, and subscribe to other users.

DevResources.name: Vector Logo Zone
DevResources.description: Vector Logo Zone is a site that provides high-quality vector logos in SVG format. It is a great resource for finding logos for your projects.

DevResources.name: GitHub Profile Generator
DevResources.description: GitHub Profile Generator is a tool that generates a GitHub profile README file for your GitHub profile. It is a great way to showcase your skills and projects on your GitHub profile.

DevResources.name: Hero Patterns
DevResources.description: Hero Patterns is a collection of repeatable SVG background patterns for you to use on your digital projects.

DevResources.name: Tailwind Color
DevResources.description: Tailwind Color is a tool that helps you generate colour palettes for your Tailwind CSS projects.

DevResources.name: Shade Studio
DevResources.description: Shade Studio is a tool that helps you generate colour palettes for your Tailwind CSS projects.

DevResources.name: Omatsuri
DevResources.description: Omatsuri offers a series of tools for web developers, including a colour palette generator, a gradient generator, and a CSS box shadow generator.

DevResources.name: CSS Grid Cheatsheet
DevResources.description: CSS Grid Cheatsheet is a tool that helps you learn and understand CSS Grid Layout.

DevResources.name: QuickRef
DevResources.description: QuickRef is a collection of cheat sheets for web developers. It includes cheat sheets for HTML, CSS, JavaScript, React, and more.

DevResources.name: Undraw
DevResources.description: UnDraw is a collection of free illustrations for your projects. You can use these illustrations in your websites, apps, and more.

DevResources.name: Heroicons
DevResources.description: Heroicons is a set of free premium SVG icons for your web projects. You can use these icons in your websites, apps, and more.

DevResources.name: Animista
DevResources.description: Animista is a tool that helps you create CSS animations. You can choose from a variety of pre-made animations or create your own custom animations.

DevResources.name: Every Hex Codes
DevResources.description: Every Hex Codes is a super cool site that showcases every single hex code in existence. It's a great resource for finding the perfect colour for your projects.
